mapper.select: SELECT article_id, ctgry_name, article_scope, to_char(article_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') "article_regdate", article_payment_type, article_payment_fee, article_content, article_ctgry_type FROM articles join ctgry_values USING(article_id) join ctgries USING(ctgry_id) join article_ctgries using(article_ctgry_id) WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND To_char(article_regdate, 'YYYY-MM') = #{year}||'-'||#{month} AND article_ctgry_type IN ('지출','수입') ORDER BY article_regdate
SELECT image_path FROM images where article_id = #{article_id}

SELECT article_id, ctgry_name, article_scope, to_char(article_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') "article_regdate", article_payment_type, article_payment_fee, article_content, article_ctgry_type FROM articles join ctgry_values USING(article_id) join ctgries USING(ctgry_id) join article_ctgries using(article_ctgry_id) WHERE article_id = #{articleId} AND user_id = #{userId}
